author: deluckybrick
title: Yes, I am reviewing road plates.
review:
You really cant go wrong with this set.  It isnt as good as the new ones in color, but really they're just road plates.  Lego was also kind enough to add bike lanes.  

Lastly, no I did not buy these, they were inherited.

author: martin_ffm
title: no real rating...
review:
I just wanted to say that its wrong, that they are not as good as the colored ones, as written in the first rating.
In fact, it always fits in your kind of town. My more industrial (harbour etc.) part of town fits perfect to the grey roads, and most houses or my airport is better with the green ones, so they are all needed!
By the way, the free space on the curved road is quite large, you can build some stuff on it to make your city more lively.

author: bmwlego
title: Hours of Play
review: I loved LEGO as a kid and the road plates were a major reason for this. These plates were great. I am sorry to see that they have been updated since I was a kid but things change over time. I still have these plates and am so happy that they survived my mom's purging of my childhood LEGO!
